channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-12652] Allow unmanaged connections in MetaTableAccessor
item.description: Passing in an unmanaged connnection to MetaTableAccessor causes an exception. MetaTableAccessor should be able to use both unmanaged and managed connections.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12685654/HBASE-12652.patch
against master branch at commit 9fd6db3703d3e7ec50b32b1e96c65ed9f2b1456d.
ATTACHMENT ID: 12685654

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 12 new or modified tests.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

-1 javadoc. The javadoc tool appears to have generated 1 warning messages.

-1 checkstyle. The applied patch generated 2091 checkstyle errors (more than the master's current 2089 errors).

+1 findbugs. The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 2.0.3) warnings.

+1 release audit. The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

+1 lineLengths. The patch does not introduce lines longer than 100

+1 site. The mvn site goal succeeds with this patch.

-1 core tests. The patch failed these unit tests:

This message is automatically generated.

Looking good Solomon Duskis.

Can we rename this method getMetaTable? Seems it's signature changed recently, so why not remove the 'H' from the name?

+  static Table getMetaHTable(final Connection connection)

I only see 1 javadoc warning, looks like it's

[WARNING] /home/jenkins/jenkins-slave/workspace/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/hbase-server/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/util/HBaseFsckRepair.java:68: warning - @param argument "admin" is not a parameter name.

Checkstyle warnings, again cannot find the other:

MetaTableAccessor, Unused import - org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.HConnection

+1, will clean these on commit
That is, will clean the warnings on commit. Open question re: method name remains.
getMetaHTable is an internal API but it's used a bunch of places. Can leave that for a separate ticket.
Skimmed the patch. Looks good.
Pushed to branch-1+. Attaching what was committed.
Thanks for the patch Solomon Duskis.

Build failures appear related to HBASE-12664, not this patch.

Let me reopen. This commit broke branch-1 builds (The TestAssignmentManager failures we are seeing). There is no TAM in trunk so we did not see the issue in hadoopqa. It took me a while to figure because yesterday did some messy commits around HBASE-12664. Let me get an addendum in after figuring the issue.
Fix over in HBASE-12671 Lets see if it takes care of the problem. If so will reclose.
